title: XDM Business Account

xdm:ownerId.title: Account Owner
xdm:ownerId.description: assigned owner of account. Not available in personal edition.

xdm:parentId.title: Parent Account
xdm:parentId.description: Parent company for companies that are subsidiaries of a larger company or organization. The parent account must be an existing account in salesforce. You can enter the account name, or select (or optionally, create) the account using the lookup icon.

xdm:territoryId.title: Territories
xdm:territoryId.description: The territories to which the account has been assigned.

xdm:legalName.title: Account Name
xdm:legalName.description: name of company. Up to 255 characters are allowed in this field.

xdm:ownership.title: Ownership
xdm:ownership.description: Ownership of company, for example, public or private. Entry is selected from a picklist of available values, which a salesforce admin sets. Each picklist value can have up to 40 characters.

xdm:createdById.title: Created By
xdm:createdById.description: User who created the account, including creation date and time. (Read only)

xdm:modifiedById.title: Modified By
xdm:modifiedById.description: user who last changed the account fields, including modification date and time. This field doesnâ€™t track changes made to any of the related list items on the account. (Read only)

xdm:modifiedDate.title: Modified By
xdm:modifiedDate.description: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

xdm:addressType.title: Account Address Type
xdm:addressType.description: Address type of Account. Example, Billing, Shipping.
